EmailTemplate.name: TS-2016-11-29-HPE Discover London.EMAIL-Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Going to HPE Discover? Come grab some swag!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Are you going to HPE Discover London next week? Well we are. We’ll be at the Turbonomic booth 143 and showcasing our latest integration with HPE OneView. With Turbonomic and HPE OneView you'll be able to:
- Guarantee the performance of any application - Accelerate your transition to hybrid-cloud infrastructure - Deliver cloud-like economics on-premises
Think that’s too good to be true? Come by our booth and we’ll show you a demo. If you can’t make it but want to learn more schedule a demo today <[[http://vmturbo.com/product/request-a-demo/]]> Hope to see you there. --The Turbonomic Team
